English: Stupid Blizzard, get the fuck out of here

Deutsch: Blöder Blizzard, verschwinde sofort.

Don't let the review bombing fool you, this game is awesome and the developers put their heart and soul into this.

As someone who's been with Overwatch since its inception, it's with a heavy heart that I express my deep disappointment in the current state of the game. What was once a promising and innovative title has devolved into a cash grab and worse version of its former self, leaving long-time players like me feeling disillusioned and disenchanted.

As an original Overwatch player who once believed in the game's potential, it's difficult to watch it fall so far from grace. The lack of communication from the developers, the unaddressed issues, and the seemingly misguided priorities have collectively contributed to a game that feels like a mere shell of what it once was. It's with a heavy heart that I can no longer recommend Overwatch to anyone looking for a fulfilling and enjoyable gaming experience.

F**K Blizzard！

I've been playing since season 3 (Overwatch 1) till now with some breaks in between and I can honestly say, it's depressing to be an Overwatch fan. They took away many features, only for them to re-intergrate them again and claim it as "the most we have done for a single season". The bar was 0, we had 3 years of content drought. They removed 1 tank so it's 5v5 now, there is little to no tanking, dps keep getting buffed (except my main Mei) and we are now entering an overheal meta. PvE was cancelled, only for them to sell a BUNDLE and not just the missions separately. We had it SO GOOD with lootboxes until they took Overwatch 1 from us.

Ever since they changed it from 6v6 to 5v5, the game really feels like a deathmatch game instead of a team game. I miss the game I loathed back then. Mei can't freeze now, understandably so but most of the other dps still feel the same, if not they are stronger now. I miss having a second tank beside me, even tho the role was not popular and it still not btw. Tanking is so much harder to enjoy and to play. I miss the synergies we had. I miss the love they put into this game. 

This season I will just watch streamers play the PvE mode that I waited for so long. It won't be that replayable, because it is literally an expanded version of Archives. I'm not interested giving more money to Blizzard. The fact you have to pay for every new battle pass and how they sell it says a lot about Blizzard. Legendary skins are so overpriced. Mythic skins are getting less customisation options. They reward you "free skins" which is just old epics or legendary skins. More of this "FOMO" attitude while actively making the game worse with these mobility and cleansing heroes and balance changes. DPS are now getting more health or bonus armor because there is so little tanking (soldier, mccree, bastion).

And Mei is just not the same anymore. They gutted her understandably so but I don't really like her anymore. Her left click "slow" is easily countered and thus not that effective to follow up on, you cannot place her wall very far away and her ult is now countered by so many new things (sombra emp whipes it, suzu, life grip etc.) and increased mobility. She can't pre-freeze and with the new modes Push and Flashpoint I am now forced to play (it's in rotation), it feels like a walking simulator where heroes with mobility have a huge advantage. Push is also hugely unbalanced as pointed out by others.

Many og devs left already that put so much love into the game. Now it's just a way for them to make money instead of developing a great game for people to play and have fun. They removed my Overwatch 1 stats for some reason, which showed all of my accomplishments. Most of my friends dropped it and this is the season I will most likely drop it too. PvE was the one thing that I was genuinely excited for with all the skill trees implemented. Now it's just a hopeless dream of what could have been.

For 12 years I served as a marine. Trusting our teammates was one of the most necessary feelings during my military service. After our military service was over, me and 4 friends started OW2. After 100 hours of playing together, all trust between us disappeared. Some of our friends started to hate each other so much that they started to have relations with each other's wives. This game is a game that ends life and destroys friendship. Don't play it!

有一天，大约是立秋后的两三天，网易正在慢慢的结帐，取下粉板，忽然说，“暴雪长久没有来了，还欠佰万个爹呢！”我才觉得他的确长久没有来了。一个玩steam的人说道，“他怎么会来？……他打折了腿了。”网易说，“哦！”“他总仍旧是贱。这一回，是自己发昏，竟贱到冲国人家里去了。他家的玩家，惹得的么？”“后来怎么样？”“怎么样？先写不服辩，后来是骂，骂了大半夜，再打折了腿。”“后来呢？”“后来打折了腿了。”“打折了怎样呢？”“怎样？……谁晓得？许是死了。”网易也不再问，仍然慢慢的算他的帐。

How to ruin a game in 6 simple steps:

step 1: Make false promises 
step 2: Take an old game and re-badge it
step 3: Remove the original game and push micro transactions without fixing bugs and issues
step 4: Release the promised content after the game died
step 5: Don't forget to make them pay for that (even if it was meant to be free)
step 6: Watch the rest of the community leave because you're too greedy to do as promised
